id.title: A string that uniquely identifies the pool within the account.
id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the pool within the account.

displayName.title: The display name for the pool.
displayName.description: The display name for the pool.

vmSize.title: The size of virtual machines in the pool. All virtual machines in a pool are the same size.
vmSize.description: The size of virtual machines in the pool. All virtual machines in a pool are the same size.

cloudServiceConfiguration.title: The cloud service configuration for the pool.
cloudServiceConfiguration.description: The cloud service configuration for the pool.

virtualMachineConfiguration.title: The virtual machine configuration for the pool.
virtualMachineConfiguration.description: The virtual machine configuration for the pool.

resizeTimeout.title: The timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.
resizeTimeout.description: The timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.

targetDedicatedNodes.title: The desired number of dedicated compute nodes in the pool.
targetDedicatedNodes.description: The desired number of dedicated compute nodes in the pool.

targetLowPriorityNodes.title: The desired number of Spot/low-priority compute nodes in the pool.
targetLowPriorityNodes.description: The desired number of Spot/low-priority compute nodes in the pool.

enableAutoScale.title: Whether the pool size should automatically adjust over time.
enableAutoScale.description: Whether the pool size should automatically adjust over time.

autoScaleFormula.title: A formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.
autoScaleFormula.description: A formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.

autoScaleEvaluationInterval.title: The time interval at which to automatically adjust the pool size according to the autoscale formula.
autoScaleEvaluationInterval.description: The time interval at which to automatically adjust the pool size according to the autoscale formula.

enableInterNodeCommunication.title: Whether the pool permits direct communication between nodes.
enableInterNodeCommunication.description: Whether the pool permits direct communication between nodes.

networkConfiguration.title: The network configuration for the pool.
networkConfiguration.description: The network configuration for the pool.

startTask.title: A task specified to run on each compute node as it joins the pool.
startTask.description: A task specified to run on each compute node as it joins the pool.

certificateReferences.title: The list of certificates to be installed on each compute node in the pool.
certificateReferences.description: The list of certificates to be installed on each compute node in the pool.

applicationPackageReferences.title: The list of application packages to be installed on each compute node in the pool.
applicationPackageReferences.description: The list of application packages to be installed on each compute node in the pool.

applicationLicenses.title: The list of application licenses the Batch service will make available on each compute node in the pool.
applicationLicenses.description: The list of application licenses the Batch service will make available on each compute node in the pool.

maxTasksPerNode.title: The maximum number of tasks that can run concurrently on a single compute node in the pool.
maxTasksPerNode.description: The maximum number of tasks that can run concurrently on a single compute node in the pool.

taskSchedulingPolicy.title: How tasks are distributed across compute nodes in a pool.
taskSchedulingPolicy.description: How tasks are distributed across compute nodes in a pool.

userAccounts.title: The list of user accounts to be created on each node in the pool.
userAccounts.description: The list of user accounts to be created on each node in the pool.

metadata.title: A list of name-value pairs associated with the pool as metadata.
metadata.description: A list of name-value pairs associated with the pool as metadata.

packageReferences.title: A collection of packages to be added from external package managers to each node in the pool.
packageReferences.description: A collection of packages to be added from external package managers to each node in the pool.

PoolAddParameter.title: A pool in the Azure Batch service to add.

osFamily.title: The Azure Guest OS family to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool.
osFamily.description: The Azure Guest OS family to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool.

targetOSVersion.title: The Azure Guest OS version to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool.
targetOSVersion.description: The Azure Guest OS version to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool.

currentOSVersion.title: The Azure Guest OS Version currently installed on the virtual machines in the pool.
currentOSVersion.description: The Azure Guest OS Version currently installed on the virtual machines in the pool.

CloudServiceConfiguration.title: The configuration for nodes in a pool based on the Azure Cloud Services platform.

imageReference.title: A reference to the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image or the custom Virtual Machine image to use.
imageReference.description: A reference to the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image or the custom Virtual Machine image to use.

osDisk.title: Settings for the operating system disk of the Virtual Machine.
osDisk.description: Settings for the operating system disk of the Virtual Machine.

nodeAgentSKUId.title: The SKU of the Batch node agent to be provisioned on compute nodes in the pool.
nodeAgentSKUId.description: The SKU of the Batch node agent to be provisioned on compute nodes in the pool.

windowsConfiguration.title: Windows operating system settings on the virtual machine.
windowsConfiguration.description: Windows operating system settings on the virtual machine.

dataDisks.title: The configuration for data disks attached to the comptue nodes in the pool.
dataDisks.description: The configuration for data disks attached to the comptue nodes in the pool.

licenseType.title: The type of on-premises license to be used when deploying the operating system.

containerConfiguration.title: The container configuration for the pool.
containerConfiguration.description: The container configuration for the pool.

VirtualMachineConfiguration.title: The configuration for compute nodes in a pool based on the Azure Virtual Machines infrastructure.

publisher.title: The publisher of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.
publisher.description: The publisher of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.

offer.title: The offer type of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.

sku.title: The SKU of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.
sku.description: The SKU of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.

version.title: The version of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.
version.description: The version of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.

virtualMachineImageId.title: The ARM resource identifier of the virtual machine image. Computes nodes of the pool will be created using this custom image. This is of the form /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroup}/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/{imageName}
virtualMachineImageId.description: The ARM resource identifier of the virtual machine image. Computes nodes of the pool will be created using this custom image. This is of the form /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroup}/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/{imageName}

ImageReference.title: A reference to an Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image or a custom Azure Virtual Machine image. To get the list of all Azure Marketplace image references verified by Azure Batch, see the 'List node agent SKUs' operation.

caching.title: The type of caching to enable for the OS disk.
caching.description: The type of caching to enable for the OS disk.

OSDisk.title: Settings for the operating system disk of the virtual machine.

CachingType.title: The type of caching to enable for the disk.
CachingType.description: The default value for caching is none. For information about the caching options see: https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsazurestorage/2012/06/27/exploring-windows-azure-drives-disks-and-images/.

values.description: The caching mode for the disk is not enabled.
The caching mode for the disk is read only.
values.name: readOnly

values.description: The caching mode for the disk is read and write.
values.name: readWrite

enableAutomaticUpdates.title: Whether automatic updates are enabled on the virtual machine.
enableAutomaticUpdates.description: Whether automatic updates are enabled on the virtual machine.

WindowsConfiguration.title: Windows operating system settings to apply to the virtual machine.

caching.title: The type of caching to be enabled for the data disks.
caching.description: The type of caching to be enabled for the data disks.

diskSizeGB.title: The initial disk size in gigabytes.
diskSizeGB.description: The initial disk size in gigabytes.

storageAccountType.title: The storage account type to be used for the data disk.
storageAccountType.description: The storage account type to be used for the data disk.

DataDisk.title: Settings which will be used by the data disks associated to compute nodes in the pool.

StorageAccountType.title: The storage account type for use in creating data disks.

values.description: The data disk should use standard locally redundant storage.
values.name: StandardLRS

values.description: The data disk should use premium locally redundant storage.
values.name: PremiumLRS

type.title: The container technology to be used.

values.description: Docker will be used to launch the containers.

type.description: The container technology to be used.

containerImageNames.title: The collection of container image names.
containerImageNames.description: The collection of container image names.

containerRegistries.title: Additional private registries from which containers can be pulled.

username.title: The user name to log into the registry server.
username.description: The user name to log into the registry server.

password.title: The password to log into the registry server.
password.description: The password to log into the registry server.

subnetId.title: The ARM resource identifier of the virtual network subnet which the compute nodes of the pool will join. This is of the form /subscriptions/{subscription}/resourceGroups/{group}/providers/{provider}/virtualNetworks/{network}/subnets/{subnet}.
subnetId.description: The ARM resource identifier of the virtual network subnet which the compute nodes of the pool will join. This is of the form /subscriptions/{subscription}/resourceGroups/{group}/providers/{provider}/virtualNetworks/{network}/subnets/{subnet}.

externalDocs.description: Setting up RBAC for Azure Batch VNETs

endpointConfiguration.title: The configuration for endpoints on compute nodes in the Batch pool.
endpointConfiguration.description: The configuration for endpoints on compute nodes in the Batch pool.

NetworkConfiguration.description: The network configuration for a pool.

inboundNATPools.title: A list of inbound NAT pools that can be used to address specific ports on an individual compute node externally.
inboundNATPools.description: A list of inbound NAT pools that can be used to address specific ports on an individual compute node externally.

PoolEndpointConfiguration.title: The endpoint configuration for a pool.

backendPort.title: The port number on the compute node.
backendPort.description: The port number on the compute node.

frontendPortRangeStart.title: The first port number in the range of external ports that will be used to provide inbound access to the backendPort on individual compute nodes.
frontendPortRangeStart.description: The first port number in the range of external ports that will be used to provide inbound access to the backendPort on individual compute nodes.

frontendPortRangeEnd.title: The last port number in the range of external ports that will be used to provide inbound access to the backendPort on individual compute nodes.
frontendPortRangeEnd.description: The last port number in the range of external ports that will be used to provide inbound access to the backendPort on individual compute nodes.

networkSecurityGroupRules.title: A list of network security group rules that will be applied to the endpoint.
networkSecurityGroupRules.description: A list of network security group rules that will be applied to the endpoint.

InboundNATPool.title: A inbound NAT pool that can be used to address specific ports on compute nodes in a Batch pool externally.

values.description: Use TCP for the endpoint.
values.name: tcp

values.description: Use UDP for the endpoint.
values.name: udp

access.title: The action that should be taken for a specified IP address, subnet range or tag.

values.description: Allow access.
Deny access.

access.description: The action that should be taken for a specified IP address, subnet range or tag.

sourceAddressPrefix.title: The source address prefix or tag to match for the rule.
sourceAddressPrefix.description: The source address prefix or tag to match for the rule.

NetworkSecurityGroupRule.title: A network security group rule to apply to an inbound endpoint.

commandLine.title: The command line of the start task.
commandLine.description: The command line of the start task.

containerSettings.title: The settings for the container under which the start task runs.
containerSettings.description: The settings for the container under which the start task runs.

resourceFiles.title: A list of files that the Batch service will download to the compute node before running the command line.
resourceFiles.description: A list of files that the Batch service will download to the compute node before running the command line.

environmentSettings.title: A list of environment variable settings for the start task.
environmentSettings.description: A list of environment variable settings for the start task.

userIdentity.title: The user identity under which the start task runs.
userIdentity.description: The user identity under which the start task runs.

maxTaskRetryCount.title: The maximum number of times the task may be retried.
maxTaskRetryCount.description: The maximum number of times the task may be retried.

waitForSuccess.title: Whether the Batch service should wait for the start task to complete successfully (that is, to exit with exit code 0) before scheduling any tasks on the compute node.
waitForSuccess.description: Whether the Batch service should wait for the start task to complete successfully (that is, to exit with exit code 0) before scheduling any tasks on the compute node.

StartTask.title: A task which is run when a compute node joins a pool in the Azure Batch service, or when the compute node is rebooted or reimaged.

containerRunOptions.title: Additional options to the container create command.
containerRunOptions.description: Additional options to the container create command.

imageName.title: The image to use to create the container in which the task will run.
imageName.description: The image to use to create the container in which the task will run.

registry.title: The private registry which contains the container image.
registry.description: The private registry which contains the container image.

TaskContainerSettings.title: The container settings for a task.

blobSource.title: The URL of the file within Azure Blob Storage.
blobSource.description: The URL of the file within Azure Blob Storage.

filePath.title: The location on the compute node to which to download the file, relative to the task's working directory.
filePath.description: The location on the compute node to which to download the file, relative to the task's working directory.

fileMode.title: The file permission mode attribute in octal format.
fileMode.description: The file permission mode attribute in octal format.

source.title: A source for files to be downloaded before running the task command line.
source.description: A source for files to be downloaded before running the task command line.

ResourceFile.title: A file to be downloaded from Azure blob storage to a compute node.

fileGroup.title: The file group in the linked storage account from which to download files.
fileGroup.description: The file group in the linked storage account from which to download files.

prefix.title: A prefix with which to filter the files to download.
prefix.description: A prefix with which to filter the files to download.

name.title: The name of the environment variable.
name.description: The name of the environment variable.

value.title: The value of the environment variable.
value.description: The value of the environment variable.

username.title: The name of the user identity under which the task is run.
username.description: The name of the user identity under which the task is run.

autoUser.title: The auto user under which the task is run.
autoUser.description: The auto user under which the task is run.

UserIdentity.title: The definition of the user identity under which the task is run.
UserIdentity.description: Specify either the username or autoUser property, but not both.

scope.title: The scope for the auto user
scope.description: The scope for the auto user

values.description: Specifies that the service should create a new user for the task.
Specifies that the task runs as the common auto user account which is created on every node in a pool.

elevationLevel.title: The elevation level of the auto user.
elevationLevel.description: The elevation level of the auto user.

AutoUserSpecification.title: Specifies the parameters for the auto user that runs a task on the Batch service.

ElevationLevel.title: The elevation level of the user.

values.description: The user is a standard user without elevated access.
values.name: nonAdmin

values.description: The user is a user with elevated access and operates with full Administrator permissions.

thumbprintAlgorithm.title: The algorithm with which the thumbprint is associated. This must be sha1.
thumbprintAlgorithm.description: The algorithm with which the thumbprint is associated. This must be sha1.

storeLocation.title: The location of the certificate store on the compute node into which to install the certificate.
storeLocation.description: The location of the certificate store on the compute node into which to install the certificate.

values.description: Certificates should be installed to the CurrentUser certificate store.
values.name: currentUser

values.description: Certificates should be installed to the LocalMachine certificate store.
values.name: localMachine

storeName.title: The name of the certificate store on the compute node into which to install the certificate.
storeName.description: The name of the certificate store on the compute node into which to install the certificate.

values.description: The certificate should be visible to the user account under which the start task is run.
values.name: startTask

values.description: The certificate should be visibile to the user accounts under which job tasks are run.
The certificate should be visibile to the user accounts under which users remotely access the node.
values.name: remoteUser

visibility.title: Which user accounts on the compute node should have access to the private data of the certificate.
visibility.description: Which user accounts on the compute node should have access to the private data of the certificate.

CertificateReference.title: A reference to a certificate to be installed on compute nodes in a pool.

applicationId.title: The ID of the application to deploy.
applicationId.description: The ID of the application to deploy.

version.title: The version of the application to deploy. If omitted, the default version is deployed.
version.description: The version of the application to deploy. If omitted, the default version is deployed.

ApplicationPackageReference.title: A reference to an application package to be deployed to compute nodes.

nodeFillType.title: How tasks are distributed across compute nodes in a pool.

values.description: Tasks should be assigned evenly across all nodes in the pool.
As many tasks as possible (maxTasksPerNode) should be assigned to each node in the pool before any tasks are assigned to the next node in the pool.

nodeFillType.description: How tasks are distributed across compute nodes in a pool.

name.title: The name of the user account.

id.title: The name or ID of the package to be installed as identified according to the package repository.
